title: We absolutely need to know what animals Rhaast, Aatrox, and Varus were.
body: You can't just say that they were Ascended, mention 9 others who specifically have animal traits, and that the current forms of the Darkin are in any way similar to their previous forms. You need to tell us what they actually were. Aatrox's story only mentions he had wings.

> Shurima wasn't always a desert, and the empire once ruled the world.

Most deserts are manmade. They surround the remnants of where a large civilization use to be. Deforestation, tilling, overgrazing, it all leads to erosion and desertification. 

There's abandoned ancient civilizations in the middle of the sahara. 
Israel use to be a place that had forests, savannah, and lions. It's only in the 20th century we've seen greenery return to Israel by man's intervention to replant the desert. 
There's a region in China that use to be lush grassland until it was overgrazed by livestock herders, turning it into an eroded barren landscape despite receiving plenty of rain. It wasn't until outside development intervention that they planted trees and built earthworks that reversed the damage and turned it into a prosperous fruit growing region. 

Shurima is just another ancient civilization that died out because bad farming practices destroyed the environment around them.
